title: Why is it, that when pre-season starts. Everyone suddenly doesn't know how to play the game?
body:
I've had a few games now.
And I do understand that new things mean people don't know the new mechanics.
That can be forgivin.

What can't be forgiven is an Amumu who doesn't turn on his W at all (his passive tears) at all for 15 mins, almost dies in the jungle every time he goes in. And since he doesn't have it on, he doesn't do any dmg.

That suddenly (Flez Q players should know this) It feel like one team has high diamonds, the other has silver?
I'm not kidding, how did the match making do this? (These are normal games)

Pre season should only mean, hay lets try out these new things (And maybe they work)
and fail while also learning of these new changes so we can get better.

Not, how do I use spells and abilities, what are runes and masteries, what does my champion do?
---

In a few weeks this will go away i know, but those games are still suck.

replies.body: The new stuff leaves some players confused, and others trying out stuff they really cant do, or turns out not to work but looked good on paper.

Game is 100% a joke at the moment. I'm at the point where I might stop playing for a few weeks. I'ts really just full of intent feeders wanting lower ranks and people just trolling for the hell of it.

just met a fiddle stay in the base for 5 mins and started feeding three lanes. our jax built stattik shiv.
they know that the preseason ranked probably will not account into s7, they do whatever they want
and for these who got boosted in s6?  they are just bronze 5 players
they are just trolling by no mean. and they know that riot never punishes them.
trollers can keep feeding and riot could do nothing to it, even if players report them.
for riot, they just punish who afk directly.
you are welcome.
